security_audit.summary: Official skill content focuses on agent authoring guidance and validation. No executable network or secret handling logic is present beyond a local validator script.

content.user_title: Build Claude Code agents with clear rules
content.value_statement: You need reliable agent files that trigger correctly and follow Claude Code standards. This skill gives structured templates, examples, and validation guidance.
actual_capabilities: Defines agent frontmatter fields and validation rules
Provides system prompt design patterns and templates
Supplies an agent creation system prompt and JSON output format
Offers triggering example formats with commentary guidance
Includes a shell script to validate agent markdown files
limitations: Does not generate or edit agent files automatically
Does not execute validation scripts for you
Focuses on Claude Code plugin agents, not other platforms
Does not include runtime testing tools beyond guidance

use_cases.title: Create new agents
use_cases.description: Design a new agent file with proper frontmatter, triggers, and system prompt structure.

use_cases.title: Standardize agent quality
use_cases.description: Apply consistent agent conventions and validation rules across a plugin suite.

use_cases.title: Improve triggering accuracy
use_cases.description: Refine description examples and commentary to reduce misfires.

prompt_templates.title: Create a simple agent
prompt_templates.scenario: New agent for a small task
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a simple Claude Code agent for log analysis. Include identifier, frontmatter fields, and a short system prompt outline.

prompt_templates.title: Add triggering examples
prompt_templates.prompt: Rewrite the description field with three triggering examples, including context, user phrasing, and commentary.

prompt_templates.title: Design system prompt
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft a system prompt with responsibilities, process steps, quality standards, and output format for a security review agent.

prompt_templates.title: Full agent checklist
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this agent file for frontmatter validity, trigger quality, and prompt structure. Provide fixes and a validation checklist.

output_examples.input: I need an agent that reviews PRs for security issues.
output: Description includes three triggering examples with commentary
System prompt sections: responsibilities, process, quality, output
Validation steps with script usage and checks

best_practices: Use specific triggering examples with clear commentary
Keep system prompts structured with steps and outputs
Limit tools to the minimum required access
anti_patterns: Granting full tool access without need

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude Code plugins?
faq.answer: Yes, it targets Claude Code agent files and workflows.

faq.question: What are the content limits?
faq.answer: Recommended limits are under 5,000 characters for descriptions and 10,000 for system prompts.

faq.question: How do I integrate the agent file?
faq.answer: Place the markdown file in your plugin agents directory and follow naming rules.

faq.question: Does it handle sensitive data?
faq.answer: It provides guidance only and does not process or store your data.

faq.question: Why is my agent not triggering?
faq.answer: Check example phrasing, context, and commentary against the triggering patterns.

faq.question: How does this compare to generic prompt guides?
faq.answer: It is specific to Claude Code frontmatter, triggers, and validation rules.
